Content: Oh, when you walk by every night, talking sweet and looking fine, I get kind of hectic inside. Baby, I'm so into you. Darling, if you only knew, all the things that float through my mind. But, it's just a sweet, sweet fantasy, baby. When I close my eyes, you come and take me on, and on, and on. It's so deep in my daydreams, but it's just a sweet, sweet fantasy, baby.
Author: Mariah Carey
